title: Going Away
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 80 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 130L
description: Going Away is a story about three children who think of many ways to travel, including by car, boat, plane, bike, balloon, train, rocket, and on foot. The repetitive text pattern is supported by delightful illustrations.
meta: chug, float, pedal, rocket, sail, zoom
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions to understand text
Reality and Fantasy : Identify fantasy and reality
Consonants : Associate the letter Cc with the sound /k/

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
